com.bluegosling.util

Interface Cloner<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of object that can be cloned
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Cloner<T>
    An object that can clone other objects.
    See Also:
    Cloners

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T clone(T o)
      Clones an object.

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        T clone(T o)
        Clones an object. Cloning an object copies it, usually a "deep" copy.
        Parameters:
        o - The object being cloned
        Returns:
        The clone
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the specified object to clone is null
        CloningException - If any step in the cloning operation fails
